title: Marathoner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Run to a player's house. The following night, you can run to two houses, and then three houses etc.
- Roleblock all players you visited last night. The number of houses you can visit at night is halved (rounded up).
- Redirect all players you visited last night to target you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can either run to as many houses as you can, or not run at all.
- After not using an ability during the night, your streak is broken and you start at visiting one house per night again.
- You may only use one of your abilities each night.

desc:
Post 874
*Can't stop running. Gotta keep running!*
